attributes.action: Ensure that foreign registered vehicles leave this country with a full fuel tank.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many foreign, LH Drive vehicles come to the UK, make deliveries or visits, and return abroad without paying any road tax and or fuel tax, yet are clogging our roads.
We petition the Prime Minister to act to ensure that ANY foreign vehicle cannot leave the UK before filling their tanks with fuel.
This way the Government will claim valuable tax from these vehicle owners, and may be able to then reduce the tax levy on UK residents by reducing the road fund license for UK registered vehicles.
